Profile OpenStack Architect - Austin, TX or Nashua, NH','15000804','!*!OpenStack Architect - Austin, TX or Nashua, NH Dell, Inc. is a worldwide provider of information technology services and business solutions to a broad range of clients. We are a well-respected provider of private cloud solutions working on advancing Dell OpenStack Cloud solution for enterprise customers. Currently, we are looking for an OpenStack Architect to join our team in Austin, TX or Nashua, NH. This role is in Enterprise Solutions Group and drive delivering complete solution in support of our Cloud offerings. Role Responsibilities: - The person we are seeking should have previous experience in driving commercial and open source software development, and in evaluation of open source and third party developed software and product for integration. - Individual is to help define roadmaps and implement software solutions in accordance with defined roadmap and plan. - This position is responsible for identifying and defining differentiators and claims for our OpenStack solution. - Identify new technological trends and potential upcoming partners. - Continuously identify opportunities for Dell internal components, provide current and future guidance for improvements of OpenStack solution features. - They must have a demonstrated ability to identify and document technology approaches at the project level. More importantly, to be able to break architectural work into actionable subprojects. - Ability to present roadmaps and directions to customers and other parties at Dell - The architect is expected to have been a contributor to at least one phase of a larger project and demonstrated the ability to move out of direct contribution and into leadership/mentorship/management roles. ','!*!Requirements: - 15 years in software development; at least 7 years either driving technology strategy for a commercial software product or open source project. - Recognized as an expert in their Software engineering discipline with specific experience related to Cloud, preferably OpenStack. - Experience with Agile or Lean process required. Direct experience working with customers to understand pain-points and influence product direction. - Demonstrates basic ability to lead projects to completion within the allotted timeframe and within the allotted budget. - Proven ability to define and execute complex plans across a matrix organization. - Track record of success working with remote and distributed teams. - Experience working with product management teams to influence a product direction in support of both customer and product. - Experience in building community alliance for open source projects. - Advanced understanding of appropriate technologies, vendor products, and competitive offerings in cloud space, preferably OpenStack - Industry advanced-level ability to analyze options for critical components / features and coordinate selection with - Must be able to work in Austin, TX or Nashua NH. Preferences: - Experience with DevOps tools and procedures, especially Puppet or Ansible. - Experience in test driven development and automated test. - Open source contributions or community engagement. - Optimum balance of performance, quality, cost, and manufacturability for products or solutions delivery. Company Description With more than 100,000 team members globally, we promote an environment that is rooted in the entrepreneurial spirit in which the company was founded. Dell’s team members are committed to serving our communities, regularly volunteering for over 1,500 non-profit organizations. The company has also received many accolades from employer of choice to energy conservation. Our team members follow an open approach to technology innovation and believe that technology is essential for human success. Why work with us? - Life at Dell means collaborating with dedicated professionals with a passion for technology. - When we see something that could be improved, we get to work inventing the solution. - Our people demonstrate our winning culture through positive and meaningful relationships. - We invest in our people and offer a series of programs that enables them to pursue a career that fulfills their potential. - Our team members’ health and wellness is our priority as well as rewarding them for their hard work.
